name: Octopulous!
description:
NOTE: Octopulous! is NOT a virus, neither does it contain any malware. Windows Defender or any antivirus may detect it as a virus, but trust me, it isn't. It's made with CTF 2.5 like FNaF games, and you've probably played them, they don't contain any malware either. So, as I said, this game is NOT a virus, and don't be afraid of downloading it. Thanks. NOTE#2: My English is not perfect, please don't be surprised if I make any mistakes. Made by OwlyCode09 and MaxiCrafti (and other people)

Get ready for a charming adventure in Octopulous! Young Octopi just can't wait to explore the world, especially his land. But beware! The dark forces kept getting stronger and they took the Life Gems! Now it's Octopi's turn to save the world! 

Journey through 5 different worlds, 25 challenging levels by total, and 5 hardcore bosses(they are really hard, even I can hardly beat them)!
